title: A joint resolution providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Secretary of the Treasury, Secretary of Labor, and Secretary of Health and Human Services relating to 'Short-Term, Limited Duration Insurance'.
committees: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions Committee
latest_major_action: Failed of passage in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 226.

subjects.name: Department of Health and Human Services
